00154 #define GROUPS_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00155 { \
00156    .id = GROUPS_CLUSTER_ID, \
00157    .options = { \
00158                 .type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, \
00159                 .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY, \
00160               }, \
00161    .attributesAmount = ZCL_GROUPS_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00162    .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00163    .commandsAmount = ZCL_GROUPS_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00164    .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00165 }
00166 
00167 #define GROUPS_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00168 { \
00169    .id = GROUPS_CLUSTER_ID, \
00170    .options = { \
00171                 .type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, \
00172                 .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY, \
00173               }, \
00174    .attributesAmount = ZCL_GROUPS_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00175    .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00176    .commandsAmount = ZCL_GROUPS_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00177    .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00178 }
00179 
00180 #define DEFINE_GROUPS_CLUSTER(cltype, clattributes, clcommands) \
00181     GROUPS_CLUSTER_##cltype(clattributes, clcommands)
00182

00186    .options = { \
00187                 .type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, \

00189               }, \

00191    .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00192    .commandsAmount = ZCL_GROUPS_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00193    .commands = (FLASH_PTR uint8_t *)clcommands \
00194 }

00199    .options = { \
00200                 .type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, \

00202               }, \

00205    .commandsAmount = ZCL_GROUPS_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \

00207 }
